website_summaries.verdict: A versatile board that offers white board and cork on one side and full cork on the other, but be prepared to buy your own markers and other accessories.
pros: Large size 48 inch by 36 inch (also available in a 36 inch by 24 inch)
1 side is half-and-half cork board and magnetic dry erase white board
flip it over for a full cork board
Comes with a removable marker tray that can be mounted to either side
cons: Does not come with any accessories such as markers, erasers, or magnets
Reports of some of these arriving damaged or bent

customer_reviews.title: Great combo board
customer_reviews.text: Cute little board for my classroom! I didn't use the mounting kit, but used Command damage free hanging kit instead. Shipped quickly, good quality and perfect for my small room!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Morris

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Combo Board !
customer_reviews.text: I love this combination cork and white board. I can write and erase things that change and pin up postcards, business cards and any other paper items I don't want cluttering the desk but want to have handy. This is so great for keeping organized that I bought two of them for two different rooms. Both arrived in perfect condition. Would love to find a smaller one for two smaller areas.
customer_reviews.author: Sharecat

customer_reviews.title: Awesome board
customer_reviews.text: I was in need of a cork board since my previous one got really old. I thought this `2 in 1` board would be a good replacement since I also like dry erase boards. It didn't disappoint for sure. Not only the use, but also installation as well as keeping it clean is super easy.
customer_reviews.author: Cem

customer_reviews.title: Arrived bent on the side
customer_reviews.text: This brand seemed to have less (1 only as of this review) complaints about bent boards than others on Amazon. So we took a chance and felt lucky, but we were disappointed to find it was bent on the cork board side. Overall we do like the quality of the materials. The only exception is the flimsy dry-erase marker holder.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Holle

customer_reviews.title: Overall Great, Except...
customer_reviews.text: I overall love this bulletin/white board combo! The only issue i have with it, is the dry erase marker holder, just slides and falls off easily. It isn't screwed on or glued on. Which is a pain sometimes, but the board quality is overall Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jaimie

customer_reviews.title: Great for organizing
customer_reviews.text: This was the size I needed for my kid's room. It works out great having dry erase and cork board, because she can keep track of school work and upcoming events, as well as pin schedules, important papers, etc. All while keeping it neat and uncluttered. Good price as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Younggren

customer_reviews.title: Huge dent in the bulletin board. Be aware!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a huge dent in the bulletin board. It was so dented that I could not even hand on the wall because it would keep popping out. I ordered 2 and they both arrived in separate packages both dented.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Lynn Marchetti

customer_reviews.title: Liked it so much I ordered it twice
customer_reviews.text: I use it for work and make a daily list on the whiteboard and post recent promo docs on the bulletin board. The markers it comes with are good and the cork board is good and thick. Push pins that come with it stay in which can sometimes be a problem with the thin cork that's got too much glue in it. I like the little tray that holds the pens because it slides to one side or the other. The only thin that would make this product better would be if it included a mini board eraser but a regular cloth or tissue does wipe the whiteboard clean with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa D

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my middle schooler to organize herself and it is great. It comes with mounting hardware and is super easy to install. You just need a level and preferably an extra set of hands to hold it while you mark it. Lots of room to organize school papers and make notes.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Walker

customer_reviews.title: I like my Combo board!
customer_reviews.text: I really like my combo board it was easy to install and i was surprised how sturdy it was. My combo board arrived yesterday with no dings or dents.
customer_reviews.author: TERRI

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for my home office. I need both cork board and white board, the size is great. I used 3M velcro to hang it (one set per corner) and that worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my home office
customer_reviews.text: I added this to my home office and I absolutely can't live without it now. I can pin my post it notes to the cork side and brainstorm on the dry erase side. A must for anyone that has tons of little notes all over their desk.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged but usable
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a pretty big dent in the back of the white board (diagonal line).
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Damaged!
customer_reviews.text: Came with two enormous dents in it. Way too much of a pain to try and ship it back for a return.
customer_reviews.author: EC_washington

customer_reviews.title: Message board
customer_reviews.text: The cork board and eraser board was perfect for what I was hoping for...large enough for message and leaving notes...would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Sparrow

customer_reviews.title: So Far, so good ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy install, etc. Gets a lot of use and still seems to be holding strong.
customer_reviews.author: TheOracle1001

customer_reviews.title: Organized
customer_reviews.text: I forgot to see if white board came with markers. I still think it’s awsome.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer123

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Perfect condition. Hung easily! Super sturdy Update: 3 months later! Still loving it!
customer_reviews.author: Ruby

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for to go in my sons room!!
customer_reviews.text: This board is well made and even comes with a few pins for the cork side. It’s easy to hang and stays nice and flat against the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Sks1212

customer_reviews.title: Must have for any business.
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have for any business or office. I use it in my office to write down goals and store inportant papers.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: White board and cork board
customer_reviews.text: Can’t decide if you want a white board or a cork board? This is for you. Great board and great size for an office
customer_reviews.author: DAF

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband to use at work. He said it works great and he uses it everyday for writing notes on the white board and hanging notices on the cork board.
customer_reviews.author: peculiarz1969

customer_reviews.title: Awesome board!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Extremely sturdy. Works awesome for pinning and using the magnetic side.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Jones

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: dollar for dollar it is actually a better quality item than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: ben ashton

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good quality product. I am very happy with my purchase. I went to Office Depot to try and buy another but it was of poor quality at a similar price. I hope they restock so I can purchase another!
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and useful.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product. Is great for my restaurant to communicate information.
customer_reviews.author: Shiri Ji

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the office
customer_reviews.text: Giant size, perfect for my office . Had to get my boyfriend to help me set up. It didnt come with screws.
customer_reviews.author: REBekah

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: this bulletin/cork board is perfect. Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Jo-Ann Dolan

customer_reviews.title: Works well for us
customer_reviews.text: Works very well for us. The cork board is thin but not a big deal. Working as expected
customer_reviews.author: Clint

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Built very well with everything inside it was very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but defective
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived damaged, box was damaged. Two of the bottom corner screw holes were installed backwards, rendering the plastic caps meant to cover the holes useless. What kind of sham products is Amazon running lately??
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good board!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice solid and well made! I use it in my office & love the two mediums! It is a bit small for much more than small notes or post -it's. Would not recommend if you need a large white Board for presenting or planning.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Y. Simms

customer_reviews.title: You have to have this!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very very pleased. Bought this to replace a older board. It looks so nice. Easy to install. You won’t be disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: ROBIE BETTES

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Like the price and definitely worth the money. Sturdy construction and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Decent, pretty much what was expected. The cork isn’t that thick.
customer_reviews.author: A. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived damaged. The board was bent straight down ...
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived damaged. The board was bent straight down the middle. Kinda hard to hand a bent frame on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Nani_Bae

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: the marker holder that sits at the bottom of the board is not very sturdy. Besides that, it's what i was expecting. However, I am concerned about the quality and durability of the cork-board.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great for a 2-in-1
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Love the cork board and the dry eraser part.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Really like and enjoy writing notes to my kids not so kids.
customer_reviews.author: MRivera

customer_reviews.title: 😭
customer_reviews.text: The cork side was a damages in the corner and the white board side was scratched I just received it today
customer_reviews.author: Nevaeh Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Great Message Board
customer_reviews.text: We used the board to display messages in the kitchen and it is fantastic. Great size and allows for us to post multiple things in a central location.
customer_reviews.author: Jalen Garmon

customer_reviews.title: Top notch Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made sturdy cork board. It includes the hardware for hanging. Also, you could reverse it by hanging it backwards, but if you do this the white board side is silver metallic — so no white board
customer_reviews.author: Richard H.

product_meta.title: 48 x 36 Inch Magnetic Dry Erase/Cork Combo Board, Wall Mounted Whiteboard & Corkboard Combination with Aluminum Frame
product_meta.description:
Size:48" x 36"

Combo Board, Dry Erase &Cork Bulletin Board
A combination board gives you more useful space and provides 2 versatile surfaces in 1 board. Use push pins to tack up items on the natural cork side. Use the dry-erase side to write notes or display with magnets. Stay better organized and keep important papers close at hand with this versatile dry-erase/cork combination board. The combination board can be mounted vertically or horizontally with attached mounting hardware. Besides, the detachable marker tray can be placed on any of the markerboard's 4 sides, to keep your writing materials close at hand.

Specifications 
Product Type: Combination Board, Dry Erase Board & Cork Bulletin Board
Dimensions: 48 x 36 inch 
Magnetic: Yes
Style: Wall-Mounted 
Frame Material: Sliver anodized aluminum 
Corner Material: ABS 
Surface Material: Coating Steel & Natural cork


Warranty
Mateboard Cork Notice Board comes with a two year manufacturer's warranty


Reminder
Recommend to mount it in the space with light traffic
This whiteboard side comes with a clear, protective plastic film. Please remove the film before first use by peeling it off starting from one of the corners.
feature_bullets: Combination board offers both writing and display functionality; ideal for light, personal use
The dry erase surface can be written on using standard whiteboard markers so you can write notes and reminders.
You can use standard push pins to attach your documents to the corkboard surface.
Mounting hardware is included to wall mount bulletin board in either portrait or landscape orientation
Silver finished aluminium frame, ABS plastic corner with screw-fixing in corners

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars162 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
